Package org.bohdansharubin.models

Class Skirt

java.lang.Object
org.bohdansharubin.models.Clothes
org.bohdansharubin.models.Skirt
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<Clothes>
public class Skirt extends Clothes
Represents a Skirt item.

A Skirt is a concrete subclass of Clothes with a fixed ClothesType.SKIRT type. The type of Skirt instance cannot be changed after creation.

An additional characteristic specific to Skirt is its SkirtLength.

    • Skirt

      public Skirt(String color, int europeanSize, AmericanSize americanSize)
      Constructs a Skirt with the specified basic parameters.
      Parameters:
      color - the color of the skirt; must not be null or blank
      europeanSize - the European size; must be within the valid range
      americanSize - the American size; must not be null
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if any argument is invalid

    • Skirt

      public Skirt(String color, int europeanSize, AmericanSize americanSize, SkirtLength length)
      Constructs a Skirt with all parameters including length.
      Parameters:
      color - the color of the skirt; must not be null or blank
      europeanSize - the European size; must be within the valid range
      americanSize - the American size; must not be null
      length - the skirt length; must not be null
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if length is null
